summary: As a Muslim woc, I don’t know if I’d call what’s been done as necessarily “disrespectful” considering the vilification Imane...
question: As a Muslim woc, I don’t know if I’d call what’s been done as necessarily “disrespectful” considering the vilification Imane went through is very accurate to what I’ve personally gone through. I do however wish they’d done other things with her season.
answer: i respect your experience i really do. and what they did to imane was realistic but i think it was a massive disservice and disrespect to the character as a black muslim girl. there’s obviously a stark contrast to how they’re treating/writing imane this season. yes, things like this happen to woc. yes, black women are vilified in real life. yes, these experiences are real. but all of skam france’s “realism” comes at the expense of people of color especially dark skin black people like yann and imane. i find it borderline trauma porn. this was obviously written and directed by white people who are obviously trying to milk realism as some sort of cop out instead of writing real nuanced stories about the black and muslim experience. i think the character deserved better and even though it was “realistic,” btw i’m fucking tired of seeing/using that word to describe skamfr’s shitty ass writing, i think it was disrespectful to the character as a whole and the potential her season held.

summary: F*** them girls
body:
F*** them girls

I just saw the clip. Please, make Imane not go back to them. I wouldn’t stand it. Please!

Make Imane see her worth and never look back at those people.

I’m disgusted at their audacity to defend Ingrig that f***** racist, in front of Imane.

And Daphne? Wtf was that with Basile? I cannot stand her, her viciousity makes my blood boil. You could see she was waiting for a chance to spew her venom.

Yes Imane fucked up, but none of them took the time to hear from her perspective. What was wrong? Why did she do it? Like you even acknowledged she was different these past weeks.

I’m tired of them, I don’t wanna see them on my screen anymore.

Even if they crawl back with the sincerest apology, I wouldn’t accept it. Enough!

Look at the way she was crying !

fic masterlist

summary: The worst part of the entire thing is that they want Imane to hurt and feel even worse whether it’s by being petty or by making...
body:
The worst part of the entire thing is that they want Imane to hurt and feel even worse whether it’s by being petty or by making her feel bad. 

By calling her “shit” and being rude

By saying she assaulted Ingrid when she just called her out rightfully so

Telling her she’s dragging them down and she doesn’t want the best for them

Calling her unhappy (no thanks to you all, girl squad)

And by being petty little shits and going out together without her, and having the audacity to post it, knowing she’ll most likely see it, and take it as a sign that they don’t need her.

~bonus~ 

Knowing something isn’t right with her, and not asking her about it or doing anything about it. Y’all are really great friends, Jesus Christ.

summary: this “80% change” (which isn’t even a change but rather a much more unnecessary, amplified version of the drama in the og) that...
body: this “80% change” (which isn’t even a change but rather a much more unnecessary, amplified version of the drama in the og) that the director and writer promised proved to be the worst take on skam, ever. a series that advocated for love, butchered for the sake of creating drama. ya’ll gunna keep on asking for more seasons after this fiasco? lmao.

tags: i feel so bad for her
i hope they work things out
summary: Imanes situation is hitting way too close to home for me. I’m not gonna sit here and say I understand her situation entirely,...
body: Imanes situation is hitting way too close to home for me. I’m not gonna sit here and say I understand her situation entirely, because I definitely don’t. She’s Muslim and black, while I’m neither of those things, but I do have a lot of my own beliefs as a Christian and I tend to have different views from everyone else. I was homeschooled a large majority of my life so I tend to be considered “strange” or “different.” At the beginning of high school, I lost my entire circle of friends. They all left and I had no idea why. At that time, I was also struggling with my own problems. I had dealt with major depression and family issues, and the fact that none of my friends seemed to care or even ask what’s wrong every once and a while had really hurt. I know that I wasn’t the kindest person, but when you’re struggling with your own issues, you don’t really notice the pain you inflict on others. I was always angry and I didn’t know what to do with myself, but my hatred and disliking towards others wasn’t because I actually had a problem with them, it was because I had a problem with myself. At this rate, the girl squad is the last thing Imane needs right now. What Imane needs is a break from school, from home, from family, and anything else that might distract her or stress her out, and she needs to focus on how she can better herself and fix her problems. She won’t be able to fix anything with the girls as long as her issues continue to grow. I’m extremely angry with the girl squad for how uncouth they’ve been, and how little they seem to care about Imanes feelings, but Imane shouldn’t need to worry about them right now. They all have their own problems that need working out, and once they’ve done that, hopefully they can come back to each other and talk like actual adults rather than teenagers who have a bunch of mental instability issues. I don’t like how things are turning out, but I hope things go better for Imane than how they did for me. I wish someone could go and tell her that she’s not a horrible person, and everyone makes mistakes. There was no harm intended behind any of the actions she took, and I wish the girls would open up their eyes and stop being blinded by Ingrid for just a few moments. They better works things out quick, because we have 2 episodes, and I don’t know how much more I can handle.

summary: The call of the ocean
title: The call of the ocean
description:
by Riley_89

“What are the other Lucases doing right now?”

“There’s a very muscular Lucas who’s surfing on a huge wave in Bali…”

This is a story about Lucas No. 37840 in Bali, except that (a) he’s not very muscular, (b) he doesn’t know how to surf and © he falls head over heels in love with Eliott No. 2560, the laid-back cool surfer mec.

Words: 374, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: SKAM (France)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

blog.name: skamreactions
blog.title: Skam Reactions
blog.description: “In every mind there is an infinite number of stars, planets, and galaxies waiting to be explored, to each their own universe.” -K.D.

summary: I think a lot of people in this fandom are wayyy too demanding. Like “I won’t watch this if this and that doesn’t happen.” Ok,...
body:
I think a lot of people in this fandom are wayyy too demanding. Like “I won’t watch this if this and that doesn’t happen.” Ok, that’s fine, don’t watch it but ruin it for the rest of us.

I’m so sick of people complaining and complaining about what characters should be and should have done to make the storylines perfect. I’m sorry if you want that you’re missing the point of Skam, completely.

So bye.

summary: yeah, their transmedia game is very weak this season. I mean just because someone else is the main, doesn't mean others stop...
question: yeah, their transmedia game is very weak this season. I mean just because someone else is the main, doesn't mean others stop posting on insta, they still have their lives? I was thinking that when Eliott was fighting with Lucas, he would  definitely post a drawing on his insta, like that is just what he does. S3 Eliott would have definitely done it. It seems like they only prepped drawings for season 3 and now I guess Eliott doesn't draw anymore? And all their photos are from the same place
answer: yes exactly, i mean of course the main focus isn’t on lucas anymore and especially not on eliott but those twice a month updates are really weird, sometimes it really feels like characters don’t exist anymore. and it’s so true eliott would have drawn something for sure. and yeah it’s only two episodes left so i don’t think that he will suddenly post a drawing, which is so strange? because it’s quite easy to ask to do more. and yes about pics from the same place lmao, anyway i hope if we get more seasons they would do a better job with social media content in the future
